absorbing-man.name: Absorbing Man
absorbing-man.desc: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

adam-warlock.name: Adam Warlock
adam-warlock.desc: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

aero.name: Aero
aero.desc: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played this turn to this location.

agatha-harkness.name: Agatha Harkness
agatha-harkness.desc: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

agent-13.name: Agent 13
agent-13.desc: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

agent-coulson.name: Agent Coulson
agent-coulson.desc: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

alioth.name: Alioth
alioth.desc: On Reveal: Destroy ALL enemy cards played here this turn. (including unrevealed cards)

america-chavez.name: America Chavez
america-chavez.desc: Starts on the bottom of your deck. Draw this on turn 6.

angel.name: Angel
angel.desc: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.

angela.name: Angela
angela.desc: After you play a card here, +2 Power.

annihilus.name: Annihilus
annihilus.desc: On Reveal: Each of your cards randomly chooses a location to move to.

ant-man.name: Ant Man
ant-man.desc: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.

apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
apocalypse.desc: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.

armor.name: Armor
armor.desc: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.

arnim-zola.name: Arnim Zola
arnim-zola.desc: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here. Add copies of it to the other locations.

attuma.name: Attuma
attuma.desc: If you have another card here at the end of your turn, destroy this.

baron-mordo.name: Baron Mordo
baron-mordo.desc: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

bast.name: Bast
bast.desc: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

beast.name: Beast
beast.desc: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.

bishop.name: Bishop
bishop.desc: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

black-bolt.name: Black Bolt
black-bolt.desc: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.

black-cat.name: Black Cat
black-cat.desc: If you end the turn with this in your hand, discard it.

black-knight.name: Black Knight
black-knight.desc: When this is destroyed, draw a card.

black-panther.name: Black Panther
black-panther.desc: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

black-widow.name: Black Widow
black-widow.desc: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

blade.name: Blade
blade.desc: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

blink.name: Blink
blink.desc: You can move this each turn. When it moves, +1 Power.

blob.name: Blob
blob.desc: Ongoing: Nothing can move this to another location.

blue-marvel.name: Blue Marvel
blue-marvel.desc: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

brood.name: Brood
brood.desc: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.

broodling.name: Broodling
broodling.desc: "We are Brood, from Broodworld. You are lunch."

bucky-barnes.name: Bucky Barnes
bucky-barnes.desc: When this is destroyed, replace it with the Winter Soldier.

bullseye.name: Bullseye
bullseye.desc: On Reveal: The next card you draw will be a 2-Cost card. (if any are left)

cable.name: Cable
cable.desc: On Reveal: Put the bottom card of your opponent's deck into your hand.

captain-america.name: Captain America
captain-america.desc: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.

captain-marvel.name: Captain Marvel
captain-marvel.desc: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

carnage.name: Carnage
carnage.desc: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

cerebro.name: Cerebro
cerebro.desc: Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

cloak.name: Cloak
cloak.desc: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

colleen-wing.name: Colleen Wing
colleen-wing.desc: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

colossus.name: Colossus
colossus.desc: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

cosmo.name: Cosmo
cosmo.desc: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.

crossbones.name: Crossbones
crossbones.desc: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

crystal.name: Crystal
crystal.desc: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.desc: When this moves to a location, +2 Power for each card your opponent has there.

daken.name: Daken
daken.desc: On Reveal: Add the Muramasa Shard to your hand.

daredevil.name: Daredevil
daredevil.desc: On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you make your own.

darkhawk.name: Darkhawk
darkhawk.desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.

dazzler.name: Dazzler
dazzler.desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each location that's full on your side.

deadpool.name: Deadpool
deadpool.desc: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.

death.name: Death
death.desc: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

deathlok.name: Deathlok
deathlok.desc: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.

debrii.name: Debrii
debrii.desc: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

destroyer.name: Destroyer
destroyer.desc: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

devil-dinosaur.name: Devil Dinosaur
devil-dinosaur.desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

doctor-doom.name: Doctor Doom
doctor-doom.desc: On Reveal: Add a 4-Power DoomBot to each other location.

doctor-octopus.name: Doctor Octopus
doctor-octopus.desc: On Reveal: Pull 4 random cards from your opponent's hand to their side of this location.

doctor-strange.name: Doctor Strange
doctor-strange.desc: On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

domino.name: Domino
domino.desc: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

dracula.name: Dracula
dracula.desc: At the end of the game, discard a card from your hand. This has its Power.

drax.name: Drax
drax.desc: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

ebony-maw.name: Ebony Maw
ebony-maw.desc: You can't play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You can't play cards here.

echo.name: Echo
echo.desc: After your opponent plays an Ongoing card here, remove its abilities.

electro.name: Electro
electro.desc: On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

elektra.name: Elektra
elektra.desc: On Reveal: Destroy a random enemy 1-Cost card at this location.

elsa-bloodstone.name: Elsa Bloodstone
elsa-bloodstone.desc: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, +1 Power.

enchantress.name: Enchantress
enchantress.desc: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards at this location.

evolved-abomination.name: Evolved Abomination
evolved-abomination.desc: Costs 1 less for each enemy card in play that's afflicted with negative Power.

evolved-cyclops.name: Evolved Cyclops
evolved-cyclops.desc: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, afflict 2 random enemies here with -1 Power.

evolved-hulk.name: Evolved Hulk
evolved-hulk.desc: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, +2 Power. (if in hand or in play)

evolved-misty-knight.name: Evolved Misty Knight
evolved-misty-knight.desc: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, give another friendly card +1 Power.

evolved-shocker.name: Evolved Shocker
evolved-shocker.desc: On Reveal: Give the leftmost card in your hand -1 Cost.

evolved-the-thing.name: Evolved The Thing
evolved-the-thing.desc: On Reveal: Afflict a random enemy card here with -1 Power. Repeat this twice more.

evolved-wasp.name: Evolved Wasp
evolved-wasp.desc: On Reveal: Afflict a random enemy card here with -1 Power.

falcon.name: Falcon
falcon.desc: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.

forge.name: Forge
forge.desc: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +2 Power.

galactus.name: Galactus
galactus.desc: On Reveal: If you're winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

gambit.name: Gambit
gambit.desc: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand. Destroy a random enemy card.

gamora.name: Gamora
gamora.desc: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +5 Power.

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.desc: Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)

ghost-rider.name: Ghost Rider
ghost-rider.desc: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

ghost-spider.name: Ghost-Spider
ghost-spider.desc: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

giganto.name: Giganto
giganto.desc: You can only play this at the left location.

goblin-queen.name: Goblin Queen
goblin-queen.desc: On Reveal: Other cards can't be revealed this turn.

goose.name: Goose
goose.desc: Ongoing: Nobody can play cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 at this location.

green-goblin.name: Green Goblin
green-goblin.desc: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

groot.name: Groot
groot.desc: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

gwenpool.name: Gwenpool
gwenpool.desc: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

hawkeye.name: Hawkeye
hawkeye.desc: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +3 Power.

hazmat.name: Hazmat
hazmat.desc: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.

heimdall.name: Heimdall
heimdall.desc: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.

hela.name: Hela
hela.desc: On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded from your hand to random locations.

helicarrier.name: Helicarrier

hellcow.name: Hellcow
hellcow.desc: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

high-evolutionary.name: High Evolutionary

hit-monkey.name: Hit Monkey
hit-monkey.desc: On Reveal: Gain +2 Power for each other card you played this turn.

hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
hobgoblin.desc: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

howard-the-duck.name: Howard the Duck
howard-the-duck.desc: Ongoing: Tap this to see the top card of your deck.

hulkbuster.name: Hulkbuster
hulkbuster.desc: On Reveal: Merge this card with a random friendly card at this location.

human-torch.name: Human Torch
human-torch.desc: When this moves, double its Power.

iceman.name: Iceman
iceman.desc: On Reveal: Give a random card in your opponent's hand +1 Cost. (maximum 6)

invisible-woman.name: Invisible Woman

iron-fist.name: Iron Fist
iron-fist.desc: On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it one location to the left.

iron-lad.name: Iron Lad
iron-lad.desc: On Reveal: Copy the text of your deck's top card.

iron-man.name: Iron Man
iron-man.desc: Ongoing: Your total Power is doubled at this location.

ironheart.name: Ironheart
ironheart.desc: On Reveal: Give 3 other friendly cards +2 Power.

jane-foster-mighty-thor.name: Jane Foster Mighty Thor
jane-foster-mighty-thor.desc: On Reveal: Draw all cards that Cost 0 from your deck.

jean-grey.name: Jean Grey
jean-grey.desc: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)

jeff-the-baby-land-shark.name: Jeff the Baby Land Shark

jessica-jones.name: Jessica Jones
jessica-jones.desc: On Reveal: If you don't play a card here next turn, +4 Power.

jubilee.name: Jubilee
jubilee.desc: On Reveal: Add the top card of your deck to this location.

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.desc: On Reveal: If your opponent played cards here this turn, move them randomly.

kang.name: Kang

king-eitri.name: King Eitri
king-eitri.desc: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +4 Power.

kingpin.name: Kingpin
kingpin.desc: When a card moves here on turn 6, destroy it.

kitty-pryde.name: Kitty Pryde
kitty-pryde.desc: When this returns to your hand, +1 Power. Returns at the start of each turn.

klaw.name: Klaw
klaw.desc: Ongoing: The location to the right has +6 Power.

knull.name: Knull
knull.desc: Ongoing: Has the combined Power of all cards destroyed this game.

korg.name: Korg
korg.desc: On Reveal: Shuffle a Rock into your opponent's deck.

kraven.name: Kraven
kraven.desc: When a card moves here, this gains +2 Power.

lady-deathstrike.name: Lady Deathstrike
lady-deathstrike.desc: On Reveal: Destroy each card here with less Power than this.

lady-sif.name: Lady Sif
lady-sif.desc: On Reveal: Discard the highest-cost card from your hand.

leader.name: Leader

leech.name: Leech

legion.name: Legion
legion.desc: On Reveal: Replace each other location with this one.

lizard.name: Lizard
lizard.desc: Ongoing: -4 Power if your opponent has 4 cards here.

lockjaw.name: Lockjaw
lockjaw.desc: After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck. (once per turn)

loki.name: Loki

luke-cage.name: Luke Cage
luke-cage.desc: Ongoing: Your cards can't have their Power reduced.

mbaku.name: M'Baku

magik.name: Magik
magik.desc: On Reveal: Replace this location with 'Limbo'. Doesn't work after turn 5.

magneto.name: Magneto

makkari.name: Makkari
makkari.desc: When you draw this, place it at a random location.

mantis.name: Mantis
mantis.desc: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, draw a card from their deck.

maria-hill.name: Maria Hill
maria-hill.desc: On Reveal: Add a random 1 or 2-Cost card to your hand.

master-mold.name: Master Mold

maximus.name: Maximus
maximus.desc: On Reveal: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

medusa.name: Medusa

mephisto.name: Mephisto
mephisto.desc: If you win this game, double your winnings.

miles-morales.name: Miles Morales
miles-morales.desc: If a card moved last turn, this costs 1.

mind-stone.name: Mind Stone

mirage.name: Mirage

mister-negative.name: Mister Negative

mister-sinister.name: Mister Sinister

mobius-m-mobius.name: Mobius M. Mobius

mojo.name: Mojo

moon-knight.name: Moon Knight
moon-knight.desc: On Reveal: Discard a card from each player's hand.

morbius.name: Morbius
morbius.desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each time you discarded a card this game.

morph.name: Morph
morph.desc: On Reveal: Become a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand.

ms-marvel.name: Ms. Marvel
ms-marvel.desc: Ongoing: If this is your only card here, adjacent locations have +5 Power.

multiple-man.name: Multiple Man
multiple-man.desc: When this moves, add a copy to the old location.

mysterio.name: Mysterio
mysterio.desc: As you play this, play Illusions to other locations. Disguise this as an Illusion until the game ends.

mysterio-.name: Mysterio?
mysterio-.desc: Which is the real Mysterio? The real one has 4 Power.

mystique.name: Mystique
mystique.desc: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an Ongoing, copy its text. (if it's in play)

nakia.name: Nakia
nakia.desc: On Reveal: Give all cards in your hand +1 Power.

namor.name: Namor
namor.desc: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.

nebula.name: Nebula

negasonic-teenage-warhead.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead

nick-fury.name: Nick Fury
nick-fury.desc: On Reveal: Add 3 random 6-Cost cards to your hand.

night-nurse.name: Night Nurse

nimrod.name: Nimrod
nimrod.desc: When this is destroyed, add a copy to each other location.

nova.name: Nova
nova.desc: When this is destroyed, give your cards +1 Power.

odin.name: Odin

okoye.name: Okoye
okoye.desc: On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.

omega-red.name: Omega Red
omega-red.desc: Ongoing: If you're ahead by 10 Power here, +4 Power to other locations.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.desc: Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects at this location.

orka.name: Orka
orka.desc: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.

patriot.name: Patriot
patriot.desc: Ongoing: Your cards with no abilities have +2 Power.

polaris.name: Polaris
polaris.desc: On Reveal: Move an opposing 1 or 2-Cost card to this location.

power-stone.name: Power Stone

professor-x.name: Professor X
professor-x.desc: Ongoing: Lock down this location. (Cards can't be added, removed, etc.)

psylocke.name: Psylocke
psylocke.desc: On Reveal: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

punisher.name: Punisher

quake.name: Quake
quake.desc: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, swap the positions of each location.

quinjet.name: Quinjet

random.name: Random

ravonna-renslayer.name: Ravonna Renslayer
ravonna-renslayer.desc: Ongoing: Your cards with 1 or less Power cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

reality-stone.name: Reality Stone
reality-stone.desc: On Reveal: Transform this location into a new one. Draw a card.

red-guardian.name: Red Guardian
red-guardian.desc: On Reveal: You must play a card here next turn.

red-skull.name: Red Skull
red-skull.desc: Ongoing: Enemy cards at this location have +2 Power.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +5 Power.

rhino.name: Rhino
rhino.desc: On Reveal: Ruin this location. (remove its ability)

rocket-raccoon.name: Rocket Raccoon
rocket-raccoon.desc: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

rockslide.name: Rockslide

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.desc: On Reveal: Steal an Ongoing ability from a random enemy card at this location.

ronan-the-accuser.name: Ronan the Accuser
ronan-the-accuser.desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's hand.

sabretooth.name: Sabretooth
sabretooth.desc: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs 0.

sandman.name: Sandman
sandman.desc: Ongoing: Players can only play 1 card a turn.

sauron.name: Sauron
sauron.desc: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

scarlet-witch.name: Scarlet Witch
scarlet-witch.desc: On Reveal: Replace this location with a random new one.

scorpion.name: Scorpion
scorpion.desc: On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent's hand with -1 Power.

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.desc: On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.

sentry.name: Sentry
sentry.desc: You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -10 Power Void to the right location.

sera.name: Sera
sera.desc: Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

shadow-king.name: Shadow King
shadow-king.desc: On Reveal: Set all cards here to their original base Power.

shang-chi.name: Shang-Chi

shanna.name: Shanna
shanna.desc: On Reveal: Add a random 1-Cost card to each location.

she-hulk.name: She-Hulk
she-hulk.desc: Costs 1 less for each unspent Energy last turn.

shuri.name: Shuri
shuri.desc: On Reveal: If you play your next card here, double its Power.

silk.name: Silk

silver-sable.name: Silver Sable
silver-sable.desc: You can only play this at a location where you have 6+ total Power.

silver-samurai.name: Silver Samurai

silver-surfer.name: Silver Surfer

sinister-clone.name: Sinister Clone

snowguard.name: Snowguard

snowguard-bear.name: Snowguard Bear

snowguard-hawk.name: Snowguard Hawk

snowguard-wolf.name: Snowguard Wolf
snowguard-wolf.desc: Ongoing: -2 Power for each other card you have here.

soul-stone.name: Soul Stone

space-stone.name: Space Stone

spectrum.name: Spectrum
spectrum.desc: On Reveal: Give your Ongoing cards +2 Power.

spider-ham.name: Spider-Ham

spider-man.name: Spider-Man
spider-man.desc: On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from here to there.

spider-man-2099.name: Spider-Man 2099
spider-man-2099.desc: The first time this moves to a location, destroy an enemy card there.

spider-woman.name: Spider-Woman
spider-woman.desc: On Reveal: Afflict all enemy cards here with -1 Power.

squirrel-girl.name: Squirrel Girl

star-lord.name: Star-Lord

stature.name: Stature

stegron.name: Stegron

storm.name: Storm

strong-guy.name: Strong Guy

stryfe.name: Stryfe

sunspot.name: Sunspot

super-skrull.name: Super-Skrull

surtur.name: Surtur

swarm.name: Swarm

taskmaster.name: Taskmaster
taskmaster.desc: On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)

thanos.name: Thanos
thanos.desc: At the start of the game, shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

the-collector.name: The Collector
the-collector.desc: When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck), +1 Power.

the-hood.name: The Hood
the-hood.desc: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.

the-infinaut.name: The Infinaut
the-infinaut.desc: If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.

the-living-tribunal.name: The Living Tribunal
the-living-tribunal.desc: Ongoing: Split your total Power evenly among all locations.

the-phoenix-force.name: The Phoenix Force
the-phoenix-force.desc: On Reveal: Revive one of your destroyed cards and merge with it. That card can move each turn.

thor.name: Thor
thor.desc: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.

time-stone.name: Time Stone
time-stone.desc: On Reveal: Draw a card. Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

titania.name: Titania
titania.desc: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

toad.name: Toad
toad.desc: On Reveal: Move the last card you played to this location.

typhoid-mary.name: Typhoid Mary
typhoid-mary.desc: Ongoing: Your other cards have -1 Power.

uatu-the-watcher.name: Uatu the Watcher
uatu-the-watcher.desc: Once this is in your hand, you can see the unrevealed locations.

ultron.name: Ultron
ultron.desc: On Reveal: Create four 1-Power Drones at each other location.

uncle-ben.name: Uncle Ben
uncle-ben.desc: When this card is destroyed, add Spider-Man to your hand.

valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
valkyrie.desc: On Reveal: Set ALL cards at this location to 3 Power.

venom.name: Venom
venom.desc: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location. Add their Power to this card.

viper.name: Viper
viper.desc: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of one of your other cards at this location.

vision.name: Vision
vision.desc: You can move this each turn.

viv-vision.name: Viv Vision
viv-vision.desc: When you move a card to a location, move this card there as well.

warpath.name: Warpath
warpath.desc: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +4 Power.

wasp.name: Wasp
wasp.desc: "My secret power is that I get things done."

wave.name: Wave
wave.desc: On Reveal: All cards cost 4 until the end of next turn.

white-queen.name: White Queen
white-queen.desc: On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

white-tiger.name: White Tiger
white-tiger.desc: On Reveal: Add a 7-Power Tiger to another location.

widows-bite.name: Widow's Bite
widows-bite.desc: While this is in your hand, you can't draw cards.

winter-soldier.name: Winter Soldier
winter-soldier.desc: "It's time for me to face the past."

witchfire.name: Witchfire
witchfire.desc: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane
wolfsbane.desc: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

wolverine.name: Wolverine
wolverine.desc: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location with +2 Power.

wong.name: Wong
wong.desc: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.

x-23.name: X-23
x-23.desc: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

yellowjacket.name: Yellowjacket
yellowjacket.desc: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.

yo-yo.name: Yo-Yo
yo-yo.desc: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

yondu.name: Yondu
yondu.desc: On Reveal: Destroy the top card of your opponent's deck.

zero.name: Zero
zero.desc: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
